scripts.createLambda: aws lambda create-function --function-name guzhongren-s3-copy --zip-file fileb://../guzhongren-s3-copy.zip --handler index.handler --runtime nodejs12.x --role arn:aws:iam::494526681395:role/for-aws-training-2
scripts.invoke: aws lambda invoke --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out --function-name guzhongren-s3-copy response.json
